name: Scoliosis
description: This module describes the common data elements for scoliosis use case.

attributes.name: Cobb angle
attributes.description: Measure coronal plane deformity on anteroposterior plane radiographs in the classification of scoliosis (degrees)

attributes.name: Pelvic tilt
attributes.description: Angle between the iliac crest to the horizontal (degrees)

attributes.name: Triradiate cartilage
attributes.description: Epiphyseal plate between the ilium, ischium, and pubis to form the acetabulum of the os coxae

attributes.name: Vertebral body numbering
attributes.description: Numbering order of the vertebrae of the human spinal column (pixel identification)

attributes.name: Pelvic incidence
attributes.description: Angle of incidence is the algebraic sum of 2 complementary angles: pelvic tilt and sacral slope (degrees)

attributes.name: Sagittal vertical axis
attributes.description: Sagittal offset of a plumb line dropped from the C7 vertebral body from the posterosuperior corner of the sacral plate (mm)

attributes.name: Lumbar lordosis angle
attributes.description: Anterior convexity of the lumbar spine in the midsagittal plane (degrees)

attributes.name: Scoliosis type
attributes.description: Classify the scoliosis type, which is required information for ICD-10

attributes.name: Risser score
attributes.description: Grade skeletal maturity based on the level of ossification and fusion of the iliac crest apophyses
